name: calmness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being peaceful, quiet, and without worry: Mark exudes calmness and never gets rattled. Despite the calmness of his voice, I could tell he was angry.
the quality of having no hurried movement or noise: This area is good for swimming because of the relative calmness of the waters. See
calm
More examplesFewer examplesI love the calmness of meditation.She will always be remembered for her calmness under pressure.There was a serenity and calmness in all of his movements.I am a little surprised at the relative calmness of the water here.
